plot: A hapless movie theatre usher makes it his mission to get moviegoers to throw away their trash. This time he has devised the perfect plan. Unfortunately, the patrons have something else in mind.
title: The Usher
plot_es: A hapless movie theatre usher makes it his mission to get moviegoers to throw away their trash. This time he has devised the perfect plan. Unfortunately, the patrons have something else in mind.
plot_en: A hapless movie theatre usher makes it his mission to get moviegoers to throw away their trash. This time he has devised the perfect plan. Unfortunately, the patrons have something else in mind.
